txt.en: Elf-wights and fallen soldier wights can be found in Parth Daenath.\n\nYou should lay to rest your slain fellows.

'Must we now fight our own? By some dark necromancy, Sauron has infused the bodies of our fallen with vile spirits and brought them back to fight their former brethren. These were once good Men and Elves, but now they move without thought, animated by vile spirits. We must slay these wights, and put an end to this worst affront of Sauron.'
Soldiers who fell in battle have been brought back as horrifying wights to fight against their fellows.
Thranduil can be found at Echad-in-Edhil.\n\nYou should talk to Thranduil.

'The wights are no more? Then the bodies of our fallen no longer move in anguish, and may return to their rest. Should the Dark Lord send these spirits against us once again, we will be ready. I thank you for what you have done this day.'
